body_html:
Hey guys, what is the use-case here?
Actually the plan was to open-source predictor we have internally. Predictor in this PR is really mobile one, it doesn't work with MetaNetDef format we use for server side and doesn't do a good job for multi-threaded inference.

If we invest into this, should we actually just put more time toward OSS of the server side predictor and cleaning up the GPU path?
body_text:
Hey guys, what is the use-case here?
Actually the plan was to open-source predictor we have internally. Predictor in this PR is really mobile one, it doesn't work with MetaNetDef format we use for server side and doesn't do a good job for multi-threaded inference.
If we invest into this, should we actually just put more time toward OSS of the server side predictor and cleaning up the GPU path?
body:
Hey guys, what is the use-case here? 
Actually the plan was to open-source predictor we have internally. Predictor in this PR is really mobile one, it doesn't work with MetaNetDef format we use for server side and doesn't do a good job for multi-threaded inference. 

If we invest into this, should we actually just put more time toward OSS of the server side predictor and cleaning up the GPU path?
